name: Wardens of the Amber Cage
description: A cooperative action dungeon crawler. Support Virtual Reality headsets. Become a warmage and keep the horrors inside the Amber Cage !
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only Processor: SSE2 instruction supported. For VR : Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. For VR : GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: The demonstration version is less than 100mb and should ensure the game work on your computer.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Network: Broadband Internet connection
